name: Proof of Degen
description: Proof Of Meme The new blockchain exclusively for Memecoins PODchain is a Proof Of Work BSC fork of BEP-20 Full-spectrum suite of tools and utilities for memecoin developers & communities We aim to build a new network with a thriving community of BSC lovers, bringing them a safer environment, equipped with the best trading tools for meme coins. We have seen faults in security on networks and aim to make crypto a safer place for all.
